title: Cardinal meets Pope Francis
body_lines: Archbishop of Colombo Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith has met His Holiness Pope Francis at Vatican today (28), the Archdiocese of Colombo said.
The duo discussed on the investigations that are carried out on the Easter Sunday bomb attack. They met at 3.30 Sri Lankan time.
The church has expressed it's disatisfaction on the investigations carried out with regard to the bomb attack and delay in finding the master mind behind the attack. (Yohan Perera)
